subject_lines: Use numbers ("3 tracks that...", "You earned 247 tokens")
Create urgency ("This weekend only", "24 hours left")
Ask questions ("Ready to discover your next favorite artist?")
Be direct ("New certified tracks", "Your weekly digest")
body_copy: End with signature from team, not generic company
ctas: Use action verbs (Rate, Discover, Claim, Join)
Make it specific ("Rate your first track" not "Get started")
Use buttons for primary CTA, links for secondary
